verses.verse: And the men <WH376> of Efrayim <WH669> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Why hast thou <WH4100> served <WH6213> <WH8804> us thus <WH1697>, that thou calledst <WH7121> <WH8800> us not, when thou wentest <WH1980> <WH8804> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> with the Midianites <WH4080>? And they did chide <WH7378> <WH8799> with him sharply <WH2394>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, What have I done <WH6213> <WH8804> now in comparison of you? Is not the gleaning <WH5955> of the grapes of Efrayim <WH669> better <WH2896> than the vintage <WH1210> of Abiezer <WH44> ?

'Elohim <WH430> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> into your hands <WH3027> the princes <WH8269> of Midian <WH4080>, Oreb <WH6159> and Zeeb <WH2062>: and what was I able <WH3201> <WH8804> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> in comparison of you? Then their anger <WH7307> was abated <WH7503> <WH8804> toward him, when he had said <WH1697> that <WH1696> <WH8763>.

And Gid`on <WH1439> came <WH935> <WH8799> to Yarden <WH3383>, and passed over <WH5674> <WH8802>, he, and the three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> men <WH376> that were with him, faint <WH5889>, yet pursuing <WH7291> <WH8802> them.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the men <WH582> of Sukkot <WH5523>, Give <WH5414> <WH8798>, I pray you, loaves <WH3603> of bread <WH3899> unto the people <WH5971> that follow <WH7272> me; for they be faint <WH5889>, and I am pursuing <WH7291> <WH8802> after <WH310> Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759>, kings <WH4428> of Midian <WH4080>.

And the princes <WH8269> of Sukkot <WH5523> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Are the hands <WH3709> of Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759> now in thine hand <WH3027>, that we should give <WH5414> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> unto thine army <WH6635> ?

And Gid`on <WH1439> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Therefore when the YY <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8800> Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759> into mine hand <WH3027>, then I will tear <WH1758> <WH8804> your flesh <WH1320> with the tshofars <WH6975> of the wilderness <WH4057> and with briers <WH1303>.

And he went up <WH5927> <WH8799> thence to Penuel <WH6439>, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them likewise <WH2063>: and the men <WH582> of Penuel <WH6439> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> him as the men <WH582> of Sukkot <WH5523> had answered <WH6030> <WH8804> him.

And he spake <WH559> <WH8799> also unto the men <WH582> of Penuel <WH6439>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, When I come again <WH7725> <WH8800> in peace <WH7965>, I will break down <WH5422> <WH8799> this tower <WH4026>.

Now Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759> were in Karkor <WH7174>, and their hosts <WH4264> with them, about fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> thousand <WH505> men, all that were left <WH3498> <WH8737> of all the hosts <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of the east <WH6924>: for there fell <WH5307> <WH8802> an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> that drew <WH8025> <WH8802> sword <WH2719>.

And Gid`on <WH1439> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> by the way <WH1870> of them that dwelt <WH7931> <WH8803> in tents <WH168> on the east <WH6924> of Nobah <WH5025> and Jogbehah <WH3011>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the host <WH4264>: for the host <WH4264> was secure <WH983>.

And when Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759> fled <WH5127> <WH8799>, he pursued <WH7291> <WH8799> after <WH310> them, and took <WH3920> <WH8799> the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of Midian <WH4080>, Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759>, and discomfited <WH2729> <WH8689> all the host <WH4264>.
And Gid`on <WH1439> the son <WH1121> of Yo'ash <WH3101> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> from battle <WH4421> before <WH4608> the sun <WH2775> was up,

And caught <WH3920> <WH8799> a young man <WH5288> of the men <WH582> of Sukkot <WH5523>, and enquired <WH7592> <WH8799> of him: and he described <WH3789> <WH8799> unto him the princes <WH8269> of Sukkot <WH5523>, and the elders <WH2205> thereof, even threescore and seventeen <WH7657> <WH7651> men <WH376>.

And he came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the men <WH582> of Sukkot <WH5523>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759>, with whom ye did upbraid <WH2778> <WH8765> me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Are the hands <WH3709> of Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759> now in thine hand <WH3027>, that we should give <WH5414> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> unto thy men <WH582> that are weary <WH3287> ?

And he took <WH3947> <WH8799> the elders <WH2205> of the city <WH5892>, and tshofars <WH6975> of the wilderness <WH4057> and briers <WH1303>, and with them he taught <WH3045> <WH8686> the men <WH582> of Sukkot <WH5523>.
And he beat down <WH5422> <WH8804> the tower <WH4026> of Penuel <WH6439>, and slew <WH2026> <WH8799> the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> he unto Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759>, What <WH375> manner of men <WH582> were they whom ye slew <WH2026> <WH8804> at Tavor <WH8396>? And they answered <WH559> <WH8799>, As thou <WH3644> art, so were they; each one <WH259> resembled <WH8389> the children <WH1121> of a king <WH4428>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, They were my brethren <WH251>, even the sons <WH1121> of my mother <WH517>: as the YY <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, if <WH3863> ye had saved them alive <WH2421> <WH8689>, I would not slay <WH2026> <WH8804> you.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Jether <WH3500> his firstborn <WH1060>, Up <WH6965> <WH8798>, and slay <WH2026> <WH8798> them. But the youth <WH5288> drew <WH8025> <WH8804> not his sword <WH2719>: for he feared <WH3372> <WH8804>, because he was yet a youth <WH5288>.

Then Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Rise <WH6965> <WH8798> thou, and fall <WH6293> <WH8798> upon us: for as the man <WH376> is, so is his strength <WH1369>. And Gid`on <WH1439> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and slew <WH2026> <WH8799> Zebah <WH2078> and Zalmunna <WH6759>, and took away <WH3947> <WH8799> the ornaments <WH7720> that were on their camels <WH1581> ' necks <WH6677>.

Then the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Gid`on <WH1439>, Rule <WH4910> <WH8798> thou over us, both thou, and thy son <WH1121>, and thy son's <WH1121> son <WH1121> also: for thou hast delivered <WH3467> <WH8689> us from the hand <WH3027> of Midian <WH4080>.

And Gid`on <WH1439> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I will not rule <WH4910> <WH8799> over you, neither shall my son <WH1121> rule <WH4910> <WH8799> over you: the YY <WH3068> shall rule <WH4910> <WH8799> over you.

And Gid`on <WH1439> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I would desire <WH7592> <WH8799> a request <WH7596> of you, that ye would give <WH5414> <WH8798> me every man <WH376> the earrings <WH5141> of his prey <WH7998>. (For they had golden <WH2091> earrings <WH5141>, because they were Yishma`elims <WH3459>.)

And they answered <WH559> <WH8799>, We will willingly <WH5414> <WH8800> give <WH5414> <WH8799> them. And they spread <WH6566> <WH8799> a garment <WH8071>, and did cast <WH7993> <WH8686> therein every man <WH376> the earrings <WH5141> of his prey <WH7998>.

And the weight <WH4948> of the golden <WH2091> earrings <WH5141> that he requested <WH7592> <WH8804> was a thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> shekels of gold <WH2091>; beside ornaments <WH7720>, and collars <WH5188>, and purple <WH713> raiment <WH899> that was on the kings <WH4428> of Midian <WH4080>, and beside the chains <WH6060> that were about their camels <WH1581> ' necks <WH6677>.

And Gid`on <WH1439> made <WH6213> <WH8799> an ephod <WH646> thereof, and put <WH3322> <WH8686> it in his city <WH5892>, even in Ophrah <WH6084>: and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> went thither a whoring <WH2181> <WH8799> after <WH310> it: which thing became a snare <WH4170> unto Gid`on <WH1439>, and to his house <WH1004>.

Thus was Midian <WH4080> subdued <WH3665> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, so that they lifted up <WH5375> <WH8800> their heads <WH7218> no more <WH3254> <WH8804>. And the country <WH776> was in quietness <WH8252> <WH8799> forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the days <WH3117> of Gid`on <WH1439>.
And Yeruba`al <WH3378> the son <WH1121> of Yo'ash <WH3101> went <WH3212> <WH8799> and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in his own house <WH1004>.
And Gid`on <WH1439> had threescore and ten <WH7657> sons <WH1121> of his body <WH3409> begotten <WH3318> <WH8802>: for he had many <WH7227> wives <WH802>.
And his concubine <WH6370> that was in SH'khem <WH7927>, she also bare <WH3205> <WH8804> him a son <WH1121>, whose name <WH8034> he called <WH7760> <WH8799> Abimelech <WH40>.

And Gid`on <WH1439> the son <WH1121> of Yo'ash <WH3101> died <WH4191> <WH8799> in a good <WH2896> old age <WH7872>, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> in the sepulchre <WH6913> of Yo'ash <WH3101> his father <WH1>, in Ophrah <WH6084> of the Abiezrites <WH33>.

And it came to pass, as soon as Gid`on <WH1439> was dead <WH4191> <WH8804>, that the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> turned again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and went a whoring <WH2181> <WH8799> after <WH310> Baalim <WH1168>, and made <WH7760> <WH8799> Baalberith <WH1170> their god <WH430>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> not the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>, who had delivered <WH5337> <WH8688> them out of the hands <WH3027> of all their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> on every side <WH5439>:

Neither shewed <WH6213> <WH8804> they kindness <WH2617> to the house <WH1004> of Yeruba`al <WH3378>, namely, Gid`on <WH1439>, according to all the goodness <WH2896> which he had shewed <WH6213> <WH8804> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
